DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to further investigate the use of a modified Atkins diet for children with intractable, daily seizures. It is a follow-up to a study recently completed by our institution. In this 6-month study, children will be randomized to either 10 or 20 grams of carbohydrate per day, then crossed over to the opposite amount at 3 months.
DOC.brief_title: Use of the Atkins Diet for Children With Intractable Epilepsy: A Comparison of Daily Carbohydrate Limits
DOC.criteria: Ages 318 Daily seizures or 7 per week Failed at least 2 anticonvulsants Prior use of the Atkins diet for over 1 week Significant heart, liver, or kidney disease
